name: Llama Jump
description:
Llama Jump was a quick game I threw together to test a llama animation I made. However I was unprepared for the speedrunning, record-breaking and heart breaking project that it turned out to be. I've spent many an hour outcompeting my friends. Now it's your turn. Hope you have fun. (All glitches found can be used to beat speedrun records)

Feel free to join the discord for the opportunity to share strategies and upload videos to solidify your place on the leaderboards.

https://discord.gg/A5NsaEGAG3

CONTROLS:

WASD - CONTROLS

ARROW - CONTROLS

CONTROLLER SUPPORT

S, DOWN ARROW, CIRLCE = ROLL

W, UP ARROW, X = JUMP

T = NEXT LEVEL

R, TRIANGLE = LEVEL RESTART

SMASH RECORDS
